workProjects.title: Platform - Sport Club Management SaaS
workProjects.description: Comprehensive SaaS solution for sport club management with JWT authentication, role-based permissions, subscription management, automated billing, and parent-child monitoring.
responsibilities: Built subscription management with automated billing and invoice generation
Implemented group scheduling system and attendance tracking
Developed microservices chat architecture using Redis and notification system
Created web application (React + NestJS) and mobile app (Flutter)

workProjects.title: BSporty Admin Tools Enhancement
workProjects.description: Enhanced admin tools for the BSporty platform to streamline user management and improve booking systems functionality.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented new features for admin tools
Developed APIs for seamless mobile integration
Managed booking systems and membership purchases

workProjects.title: Caustaza Website with ML Integration
workProjects.description: Developed APIs for the Caustaza and Smartovate websites, integrating machine learning models and building real-time communication systems.
responsibilities: Developed APIs integrating machine learning models
Implemented full website translation for diverse audiences
Built real-time chat system using WebSocket at Smartovate
Developed email communication features and payroll system

workProjects.title: Charitable Organization Management System
workProjects.description: Web application to streamline activity management for a charitable organization with comprehensive management features.
responsibilities: Built centralized dashboard for activity management
Implemented comprehensive beneficiary and donor management system
Developed role-based access control with user permissions

workProjects.title: Online Classified Ads Platform
workProjects.description: Backend system for online classified ads website inspired by leboncoin.fr with comprehensive features.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented complete backend system
Developed APIs for user management and ad publication
Implemented advanced search with filters, real-time chat, and subscription management

personalProjects.title: Web Scraping Tool
personalProjects.description: Python tool for scraping specific data from awsolutions.fr with automated data processing and storage.

personalProjects.title: Real Estate Platform
personalProjects.description: Building a comprehensive real estate platform for rating and buying houses/properties with advanced search and filtering.

personalProjects.title: CV-Job Matching System
personalProjects.description: Python tool using NLP (Hugging Face Transformers) for CV and job description matching, with PDF text extraction and real-time API.

personalProjects.title: Black Friday Sales Analytics Dashboard
personalProjects.description: Created a comprehensive Power BI dashboard for analyzing Black Friday sales data with interactive visualizations and insights.

personalProjects.title: Food Delivery System
personalProjects.description: Web application for online food ordering with restaurant management, order tracking, and payment integration.

personalProjects.title: Takyim - Enterprise Evaluation System
personalProjects.description: Website for internal evaluations within an enterprise, featuring SMS notifications for events with role-based access control.

personalProjects.title: Mobile Image Sharing Application
personalProjects.description: Mobile application for sharing images, functioning like a social media platform with real-time updates and user interactions.

personalProjects.title: Labvet-International Feature Enhancement
personalProjects.description: Feature modifications on web application for laboratory food analysis with enhanced functionality and performance.

personalProjects.title: Web Chat Application
